links.description: November 22, 2016 Regular readers will disregard the current downward trend in precious metals prices. They were already warned, repeatedly, that the supposed "rally" in the precious metals sector this year was a Fake Rally. It was a set-up to position these markets for a crash, timed to coincide (more or less) with a manufactured crash of our bubble markets and already-crippled economies.
